title: Personal Information Stolen in City of Philadelphia Email Hack
description:
The City of Philadelphia says personal, health, and financial information was stolen in a cyberattack on its email environment.

title: Stealth Techniques Used in ‘Operation Triangulation’ iOS Attack Dissected
description:

title: Rockwell Automation Warns Customers of Cisco Zero-Day Affecting Stratix Switches
description:
Rockwell Automation has warned customers about the impact of the actively exploited Cisco IOS XE zero-day on its Stratix industrial switches.

title: The $64k Question: How Does AI Phishing Stack Up Against Human Social Engineers?
description:

title: Adlumin Snags $70M to Boost Security for Mid-Market Firms
description:
Adlumin, a startup working on technology to boost security for mid-market firms, has banked $70 million in new funding led by SYN Ventures.

title: University of Michigan Says Personal Information Stolen in August Data Breach
description:
The personal information of students, applicants, alumni, and employees compromised in University of Michigan data breach.

title: Number of Cisco Devices Hacked via Zero-Day Remains High as Attackers Update Implant
description:

title: Canada: Lawmakers Targeted by China-Linked ‘Spamouflage’ Disinformation
description:
Canada on warned of a "Spamouflage" disinformation campaign linked to China that used waves of online posts and deepfake videos.
